document_name: BGD_Capacity Building for Management of Foreign Aid in Bangladesh_00052620.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/BGD/00036925/BGD_Capacity Building for Management of Foreign Aid in Bangladesh_00052620.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
The overall objective of the project is to provide policy support contributing for UNDP programme development to address key national development challenges, encourage policy debate and dissemination of knowledge, expanding public policy dialogue on implementation and development challenges; and make public awareness on MDGs and strengthening partnerships with CSOs, Private sector, the media and academic institutions for local advocates for human development/MDGs. 

 

 

Component 1: Policy Support

To ensure the best practice international practices as well as the national priorities are reflected in UNDP's programming, additional expert advice will be attracted to develop further existing programmes, or to explore new initiatives relating to key development priorities of Bangladesh. Such advisory services will be provided by national and international experts by forming Policy advisory panels, commissioning strategic studies, Policy Dialogue and Citizens' survey.

 

Component 2: Networking with CSOs and Private Sector

To establish formal/informal partnerships with CSOs and Private sectors will benefit UNDP Bangladesh to strengthen relationships in order to assess its technical assistance in sustainable human development and Policy making process. This component will also facilitate in identifying allies in efforts to achieve MDGs.

 

Component 3: Communication, advocacy and media

To ensure in built communication strategy, advocate and promote UNDP's state of the art work contributing to national priorities as well as towards achievement of MDGs. The threshold is marketing UNDP's development products and programme.
UNDP Policy Support to programme development for quality techinical assistance

project_descr: Capacity Building for Management of Foreign Aid in Bangladesh (CBMFAB)
project_title: Policy Support, Advocacy, RBM & Aid Management.
